attributes.action: Return all refugees and asylum seekers home after the Isis war is over
attributes.additional_details:
Homeless levels soaring- guardian. 
Infiltration will become an economical burden for the taxpayer as said by labour.
Our authorities struggle to adequately house families of British nationals already and typically a local authority will keep a family of two parents and a child in a one bedroom flat. Coupled with the rising house prices it effectively is draining the resources of England for its own people.
attributes.background: My local council are in deficit of 70 million pounds this year,despite benefits being reduced, taxes increasing, NBC is affording to build estates for refugees. This is prominent in many cities over England. Despite the fact that our homeless statistics are soaring too, we are influxing on refugees.

rejection.details: We're not sure whether this petition is intended to apply only to refugees and asylum seekers who have fled the conflict with ISIS, or all refugees and asylum seekers, wherever they are from.
